summary: The strong presence of Over-the-top media (OTT) in high population countries such as India, Indonesia, and Philippines will drive data centre (DC) development in those markets, with more than 85% of internet users consume OTT data as streaming services that will only expand as new media and gaming platforms emerge. This growth is projected for output and streaming services and is initially at around 20%-25% CAGR in the next few years.
